description: The ODC_REC_STATUS_HX table contains the status history information for the order context record.

columns.name: ORDER_CONTEXT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order context record, which contains information about when orders are intended to be used.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that the record status was changed.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who changed the record status.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record status flag category ID for the action that was applied to the order context record status.


May contain organization-specific values: No
